title: Dark And Dangerous
description: He is the forbidden ... the lover of the night that you fear and crave. And only one woman can appease his insatiable sensual appetite.... Beauty Ravished by Celeste Anwar: What was supposed to be a getaway to an exotic pleasure island isn't what Cher expected, for she and the other females are outnumbered by werewolf males eager to stake their claim on a mate... Dream Shadows by Angelica Hart: Though pledged to a sun mage, Violet Haze risks her soul as she seeks the dark conjurer that haunts her dreams. Blackthorne's Light by Marie Harte: One woman's quest to write about the dark side of life exposes her to the darkness within herself, and the love of her life. The Dark One by Goldie McBride: TheChateaux du Beauchamp is reputedly haunted by Gerard, Count du Beauchamp, once considered one of the most powerful warlocks in Europe. Samantha Lancaster discovers he's a bit more real than that.
author: Celeste Anwar
